subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Foreign Service
lead_paragraph: The process of obtaining visas to compete in the United States has become more closely scrutinized since Sept. 11, 2001, making it difficult for many elite international runners to participate in the New York City Marathon.
snippet: The process of obtaining visas to compete in the United States has become more closely scrutinized since Sept. 11, 2001, making it difficult for many elite international runners to participate in the New York City Marathon.
